subject: Doping (Sports)
Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Magic forward Rashard Lewis, suspended 10 games for violating the N.B.A.’s drug policy, is the example teammates use to explain Orlando’s run to the Eastern Conference finals.
snippet: Magic forward Rashard Lewis, suspended 10 games for violating the N.B.A.’s drug policy, is the example teammates use to explain Orlando’s run to the Eastern Conference finals.
